Methods in roboRallyPackage that return Position

 Element Board.getFirstElementStartingAt(Position position, Orientation orientation)
          Returns an element placed on this board on the first position one encounters while moving forward in a straight line starting from the given position with the given orientation.

          Returns the ManhattanDistance between this position and another position.
 boolean Position.isPlacedAtOrientationOf(Position other, Orientation orientation)
          Returns true if the other position lies on the same line as this position, given a certain orientation (referring to this position).
static boolean Position.isValidPosition(Position position)
          Checks whether the given position is a valid position.
 boolean Board.isValidPositionOnBoard(Position position)
          Returns whether the given position is a valid position for this board.
 void Board.moveElement(Position position, Element element)
          Moves a given element from one place on this board to another place on this board if possible.
 void Board.putElement(Position position, Element newElement)
          Places a given element on this board on a given position if this element can be placed there.
